description: Calls by governors to turn away new Syrian refugees are resurrecting memories of World War II internment camps for Japanese-Americans.
title: Hoping Not to Repeat the Past
title_page: Hoping Not to Repeat the Past - The New York Times
text: George Ikeda, 93, holds a photograph of himself taken in Philadelphia several weeks after being released from an internment camp in Parker, Ariz., in 1944.
